SEARCH
Package com.fabo.mathlesson.domain

Class ProblemGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.fabo.mathlesson.domain.ProblemGenerator
public class ProblemGenerator extends Object
The ProblemGenerator class builds a List of BasicMath objects. The generated list is defined by several variables.
> Note: Subtraction and Division are filtered to maintain whole digit solutions, so the problem set leve0 0 (10's) Addition Multiplication size 100, Subtraction size 56 and Division size 27.
> The objects can be Ordered or randomized. The size of the lesson is managed by the getProblem() method and controlled by the lesser of the problem set size or configured number of problems.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProblemGenerator()
    Create a default problem generator with: - function - ADD - level - 0 (one digit) - random - false/ordered - numProblems - 10

    Generate the requested problem set build full problem set (100, 10,000, 1,000,000) from 1 to size representing digits (0-10, 1-100, 2-1000) build a problem from each main loop index and inner loop index 0 = 100, 1 = 10,000, 2 = 1,000,000

    • buildProblemSet

      public void buildProblemSet()
      Generate the requested problem set build full problem set (100, 10,000, 1,000,000) from 1 to size representing digits (0-10, 1-100, 2-1000) build a problem from each main loop index and inner loop index 0 = 100, 1 = 10,000, 2 = 1,000,000

      if asked to randomize, randomProblem == true Subtract, special case, filter out any with with the numerator greater than the denominator

      divide, special case, filter out any with with the numerator greater than the denominator and is divisible evenly by the denominator.
